name: Darn Tough Pinnacle Junior Micro Crew Socks - Children to Youths
description: Tough socks for tough kids bagging peaks or tackling light hikes. The merino blend stands up to long days and provides light cushioning.Lightweight merino blend fabric feels cool in summer, warm in winter and is naturally antimicrobial.Seamless construction ensures no slipping, bunching or blisters.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
